attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Change the guidelines on manslaughter laws. So that the sentencing reflects the severity of the crime.
The amount of family's like ours who have lost a loved one to violent street crime is growing by the day, and the small sentences that these violent people get is so small, 2 years for manslaughter (time served) and yet 18 months for tax credit fraud? Therse no comparison is there. This can not be justice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
